• Heat ready-meals until they are piping 
hot all the way through. This is especially 
important for meals containing poultry.
• Keep leftovers covered in the fridge and 
use within two days.
• Wash all surfaces and utensils, and your 
hands, after preparing raw meat. This will 
help to avoid infection with toxoplasma.
